price: "Dan jika kamu sekalian menyeru (berhala-berhala) untuk memberi petunjuk, niscaya berhala-berhala itu tidak dapat mendengarnya. Dan kamu melihat berhala-berhala itu memandang kepadamu padahal ia tidak melihat.
arabic: وَإِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَا يَسۡمَعُواْۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ وَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tadʿūhum ilā al-hudā lā yasmaʿū watarāhum yanẓurūna ilayka wahum lā yub'ṣirūna
